content: yarn over pull up a loop* repeat from * to * two more times so you have 7 loops on the hook yarn over and pull through all 7 loops finish with 1 chain nb chain 1 counts as part of the puff picot chain 3 1 slip_stitch in the first chain stitch notes * * repeat all instructions between the asterisks the number of times specified instructions between asterisks are usually for the full round repeat all instructions between the parenthesis instructions between parentheses are usually worked in the same chain stitch or space total amount of stitches per round - pattern is written in us terms - you can choose to start each round by chaining or by using standing stitches feel free to use whichever method you prefer this is not included in the written pattern so please remember this when completing your mandala o if using the chaining method  chain 1 would replace the 1st single_crochet of a round  chain 3 would replace the 1st double_crochet of a round - the chain 1 of a puff is part of the puff and not part of the pattern this chain 1 is not included in the written pattern so when there is a chain after a puff please remember this - this pattern is written in the round it does not require turning after each round © zoe ellison / confessions of a yarnaholic 2019 reproduction and publication of material and texts without permission is not allowed pattern us terms round 1 with colour a form a magic_ring *1 double_crochet chain 1 around magic_ring* repeat from * to * 11 more times finish with slip_stitch in the first double_crochet fasten_off 12 double_crochet 12 ch1 round 2 join colour b in any chain 1 space *dc3tog around the chain 1 space chain 2* repeat from * to * 11 more times finish with slip_stitch in the top of the first dc3tog fasten_off 12 dc3tog 12 ch2 round 3 join colour c in any chain 2 space * decrease chain 5 decrease around the chain 2 space chain 1* repeat from * to * 11 more times finish with a slip_stitch in the top of the first decrease fasten_off 24 decrease 12 ch5 12 ch1 round 4 join colour d in any chain 5 space *5 single_crochet around the chain 5 space puff st around the chain 1 space* repeat from * to * 11 more times finish with a slip_stitch in the top of first single_crochet fasten_off 60 single_crochet 12 puff st round 5 join colour e around any puff st * fpdc around puff st chain 3 fpdc around puff st chain 3* repeat from * to * 11 more times finish with a slip_stitch in the top of first fpdc fasten_off 24 fpdc 24 ch3 round 6 join colour f around a chain 3 space between the 2 fpdc * puff st chain 2 puff st chain 2 puff st around chain 3 space
